name: Statues (itch) (Rosden Shadow)
description:
A puzzlescript game about controlling multiple characters individually.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=d4deffa683a408e862f0cbab80ef0d59

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=d4deffa683a408e862f0cbab80ef0d59

(psst...You can play a secret level after the win screen if you press X when you are on it)

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
